name: Alex Ryder
background: Former scout service, mustered out after one term. Inherited documentation for a Type S Scout/Courier - the Highndry - from a distant relative. Competent but still finding their footing as an independent traveller.
appearance: Late 20s, medium build, practical clothing, carries a worn scout service duffel
motivations: Claim the Highndry and start a new life
Prove they can make it on their own
Find out what happened to the previous crew

scout_service_kit.description: Equipment from Mr Anders Casarii at Scout Service office, Flammarion Highport
items: 3 flight cases of circuit panels + tools for swapping them out
1 portable diagnostic/software download unit (same size as other cases)
1 container of general spares and components
scout_service_kit.notes: Must transport these up Mount Salbarii to the Highndry

expenses_credit.notes: Credited to account, spending is PC's choice/problem

notes: Solo PC for High and Dry. NPCs should treat as a competent but unproven newcomer.
